payload.content: Within six months, the problem of splitting dinner bills will be solved forever by agents identifying items, matching them to people, and coordinating transfers.

name: Within six months, the problem of splitting dinner bills will be solved forever
content: Within six months, the problem of splitting dinner bills will be solved forever by agents identifying items, matching them to people, and coordinating transfers.

payload.content: Instead of using apps like Revolut or Splitwise for bill splitting, a person paying will take a picture of the receipt and send it to their agent, which will handle item identification, person matching, and inter-agent communication for transfers.

name: Instead of using apps like Revolut or Splitwise for bill splitting, a person pay
content: Instead of using apps like Revolut or Splitwise for bill splitting, a person paying will take a picture of the receipt and send it to their agent, which will handle item identification, person matching, and inter-agent communication for transfers.

payload.content: Coordination problems disappear when software talks to software, as exemplified by the future of bill splitting.

name: Coordination problems disappear when software talks to software, as exemplified
content: Coordination problems disappear when software talks to software, as exemplified by the future of bill splitting.

payload.content: Splitwise will be obsolete within 6 months because agents will solve real-time bill splitting without requiring accurate human input and will generate delightful UIs on the fly.

name: Splitwise will be obsolete within 6 months because agents will solve real-time b
content: Splitwise will be obsolete within 6 months because agents will solve real-time bill splitting without requiring accurate human input and will generate delightful UIs on the fly.

payload.content: UI-based software becomes unnecessary when humans are no longer the primary users, as agents can interact directly with APIs.

name: UI-based software becomes unnecessary when humans are no longer the primary user
content: UI-based software becomes unnecessary when humans are no longer the primary users, as agents can interact directly with APIs.

payload.content: In an agent-driven world, software without an accessible API effectively doesn't exist and becomes invisible if an agent cannot call, compose, or automate it.

name: In an agent-driven world, software without an accessible API effectively doesn't
content: In an agent-driven world, software without an accessible API effectively doesn't exist and becomes invisible if an agent cannot call, compose, or automate it.

payload.content: The definition of 'great software' is shifting from great user experience to reliable infrastructure and clean, accessible APIs, making the surface layer secondary and composability everything.

name: The definition of 'great software' is shifting from great user experience to rel
content: The definition of 'great software' is shifting from great user experience to reliable infrastructure and clean, accessible APIs, making the surface layer secondary and composability everything.

payload.content: Humanity is currently experiencing an inflection point of exponentially growing societal progress, similar to the disorienting pace of progress described in 'The Three-Body Problem'.

name: Humanity is currently experiencing an inflection point of exponentially growing
content: Humanity is currently experiencing an inflection point of exponentially growing societal progress, similar to the disorienting pace of progress described in 'The Three-Body Problem'.

payload.content: The author's personal experience shows a rapid shift from manual coding to using agents for most development tasks, with 99% of code for their product now written by AI.

name: The author's personal experience shows a rapid shift from manual coding to using
content: The author's personal experience shows a rapid shift from manual coding to using agents for most development tasks, with 99% of code for their product now written by AI.

payload.content: If a product cannot be integrated into the emerging agent ecosystem, it will become irrelevant.

name: If a product cannot be integrated into the emerging agent ecosystem, it will bec
content: If a product cannot be integrated into the emerging agent ecosystem, it will become irrelevant.

payload.content: An entirely new layer of infrastructure will emerge for agent-to-agent communication, marketplaces, wallets, and identity systems, none of which fully exist yet.

name: An entirely new layer of infrastructure will emerge for agent-to-agent communica
content: An entirely new layer of infrastructure will emerge for agent-to-agent communication, marketplaces, wallets, and identity systems, none of which fully exist yet.

payload.content: When building new products, focus on designing for AI agents rather than human users.

name: When building new products, focus on designing for AI agents rather than human u
content: When building new products, focus on designing for AI agents rather than human users.

payload.content: Within six months, AI agents will handle tasks like calculating tips and managing financial transactions (e.g., via Revolut) in the background, allowing humans to focus on interaction.

name: Within six months, AI agents will handle tasks like calculating tips and managin
content: Within six months, AI agents will handle tasks like calculating tips and managing financial transactions (e.g., via Revolut) in the background, allowing humans to focus on interaction.

payload.content: There is a potential future where everyone has access to perfect code, strategy, reasoning, and writing, making intelligence ubiquitous and less special.

name: There is a potential future where everyone has access to perfect code, strategy,
content: There is a potential future where everyone has access to perfect code, strategy, reasoning, and writing, making intelligence ubiquitous and less special.

payload.content: The future will see a collapse of distance between intention and execution, where thoughts directly manifest into actions.

name: The future will see a collapse of distance between intention and execution, wher
content: The future will see a collapse of distance between intention and execution, where thoughts directly manifest into actions.

payload.content: If the collapse of distance between intention and execution occurs, the real leverage will shift to thought, intention, and consciousness.

name: If the collapse of distance between intention and execution occurs, the real lev
content: If the collapse of distance between intention and execution occurs, the real leverage will shift to thought, intention, and consciousness.
